articles.title: European Space Agency suspends joint Mars mission with Russia - Digital Trends
articles.description: A joint mission to Mars between the European Space Agency Russia has been suspended due to Russian invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: A joint mission to Mars between the European Space Agency (ESA) and the Russian space agency Roscosmos has been suspended due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine. The ExoMars mission, which included a… [+1791 chars]

articles.title: Russia to work on solo Mars mission after Europe freezes joint project - Interfax - CNA
